abstract: The position within the resource of the first byte requested.
overview:
## Discussion

When all of the requested bytes that can be provided have been loaded—including the possible [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest/contentInformationRequest] data in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest] instance that contains the receiver—the delegate should respond by invoking [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest/finishLoading()].

If the `requestedOffset` value is beyond the content length of the resource, the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest] instance is sent a [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest/finishLoading()] message without any prior invocations of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingDataRequest/respond(with:)].

# requestedOffset

**Instance Property**

The position within the resource of the first byte requested.

## Declaration

```swift
var requestedOffset: Int64 { get }
```

## Discussion

When all of the requested bytes that can be provided have been loaded—including the possible [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest/contentInformationRequest] data in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest] instance that contains the receiver—the delegate should respond by invoking [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest/finishLoading()].

If the `requestedOffset` value is beyond the content length of the resource, the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest] instance is sent a [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest/finishLoading()] message without any prior invocations of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingDataRequest/respond(with:)].

## Providing data to a request

- **respond(with:)**: Provides data to the loading request.
- **requestedLength**: The length, in bytes, of the data requested.
- **currentOffset**: The position within the resource of the next byte.
- **requestsAllDataToEndOfResource**: A Boolean value that indicates the entire remaining length of the resource from the offest to the end of the resource is being requested.
